name: Hypnospace Enforcer
description: The game takes place in the year 2114. During that year, people are using pink electronic headbands in their sleep to connect to a world called Hypnospace. It is the future, and everyone is using it. But, there are bad apples who tend to break the rules of Hypnospace, and it is your job as an HSPD Enforcer to traverse across the Hypnospace road to bring these people to justice. The gameplay is rather simple, and is split up into three pint-sized levels and even features subtext and social commentary, and ramming your police cruiser into other cars causes your screen to shake, as well as big ol' explosions, and if you hit into oncoming cars, the cars fly off the road completely.

name: TCQ
description: TCQ is a platform and puzzle game for the ZX Spectrum and MSX, inspired by Mondrian‘s paintings, and Kandinsky‘s basic shapes.

name: Mônica Dentuça
description: Sin descripción

name: O Salão Encantado
description: Sin descripción

name: Smoke Attack
description: Smoke Attack is a top-down shooter game made for the Swiss government as part of an anti-smoking campaign. The player fights against the aggressive smoking balls with cigarettes by shooting them with an oxygen gun. The goal is to reach the next level and fight even more smoke. On each level players can find extra ammunition, secret weapons and hidden keys. The gameplay is non-violent; after being shot smoking balls are turned into oxygen.

name: For I, the Moon
description: A short conversation with the moon.

name: Tron: Identity
description: Something has been taken. Enter a new Grid and forge alliances via visual novel gameplay, uncovering truths through Identity Disc puzzles. Make critical decisions and plot your own course in a world without a creator.

name: Disney Illusion Island
description: Join Mickey & Friends on a quest to explore the mysterious island of Monoth and recover three mystical books to save the world from disaster! Choose your favorite character and unlock special abilities as you perform high-flying platforming feats, solve fun puzzles, and take on epic boss battles. Run, swim, swing, and jump your way through a beautiful yet mysterious island and discover rich biomes, intriguing characters, and hidden secrets!

name: Avatar: Reckoning
description: Avatar: Reckoning is a mobile game in development for the Avatar franchise.

name: Marvel World of Heroes
description: In Marvel World of Heroes, players can create their own unique Super Hero identity and origin story. Players will need to patrol their neighborhoods to foil crimes, complete Super Hero missions, and thwart interdimensional threats. As players level up, they will unlock equipment and abilities, and will team up with Marvel Super Heroes such as Spider-Man, Wolverine, Captain America and others to battle iconic Super Villains and save the Multiverse from cosmic and earthbound threats.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Galactic Edition
description: The Galactic Edition includes 6 new packs in Character Collection 2, plus the 7 original packs from Character Collection 1.

name: Gargoyles Remastered
description: Gargoyles Remastered is an artfully crafted revival of the 1995 SEGA Genesis classic 16-bit side-scrolling platform adventure. Relive the epic journey of Goliath and the Gargoyles featuring enhanced visuals, animations, and SFX, all inspired by the acclaimed animated series. The world of Gargoyles comes to life with a level of detail that will thrill fans of the animated series and retro gaming enthusiasts alike. Experience classic gameplay that stays authentic to its predecessor while including new features such as achievements, gameplay rewind, and more!

name: Assessment Examination
description:
Thanks for applying to the Authenticity Assessment Department.

We wish you luck on your upcoming examination!

You will need it.

name: Priministar
description: Sin descripción

name: Shinobi Rising
description:
Welcome to Shinobi Rising, the exciting new game set in the Japanese-inspired cyberpunk universe of Katana-Ra. In this thrilling adventure, you play as a shinobi who must solve a murder mystery and discover the culprit behind the death of an innocent child heiress.

As you navigate your way through the streets Clan Kata’s village, the entire game takes place across one single night and you'll need to use all your cunning and skill to survive. Uncover clues and solve puzzles and inch closer to uncovering the truth behind the killing. But be warned, this is a village where not everyone is what they seem.

Who will you strike from the shadows?

name: Chrono Circle
description: Sin descripción

name: Marisa no Kagi
description: A doujin game by -NRF- based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Cebolinha & Floquinho
description: Sin descripción

name: Tinysss!
description: This is an action game created by Wanmpaku Pixels.

name: Chico Bento: Um Dia na Roça
description: Children's game about the Brazilian character Chico Bento.

name: Among Us Arena: Ultimate
description: The Ultimate Among Us Arena experience has arrived! Fight with over 30 different crewmates all with their own strengths and abilities!

name: 195 Hours in the Cold
description:
Your long journey through the icy wastes is finally at its end. You hope. Your eyes are heavy, but sleep does not come... there is a faint, distant memory of fire and bloodshed...

Pass through the empty, echoing halls to learn what has transpired in your long, long absence.

Made for the Haunted PS1 Madvent Calendar 2020.

name: Easter Bonus
description: Easter Bonus is a match-three game with an Easter theme. To clear the levels, you must turn all the squares gold. You do this by making matches of three or more items over them or using bonus items. Later in the game, some squares are coated in ice. Items in ice cannot be moved and iced squares cannot be turned gold until the ice is removed. To break the ice, you match the item trapped in the ice or use a bonus item. You must do this before the candle on the left burns down, meaning your time is up. As mentioned earlier, there are bonus items

name: Smok: Legend of the Laid-Back Heroes
description: Smok: Legend of the Laid-Back Heroes is an RPG Maker fangame themed around the talents of Hololive. To prevent the awakening of the Demon Lord, the main character, accompanied by Subaru, Mio, Okayu, and Korone, embarks on a very absurd adventure.

name: Nim's Sin Removal Service
description:
An amateur occultist fails to summon the devil, and is now haunted by seven doppelgangers representing his sins! (Will he be able to exorcise them before Dad gets home?)

Scare the spirits out of hiding, then chase them down and exorcise them from this mortal realm!

name: Dead Second
description:
Second' bullet time reaction system with high fidelity impact physics reactions. Experience Intense shoot outs and gunplay unlike any game before it!

You're a righteous 'GUN FOR HIRE' taking care of the CORRUPT and WICKED throughout the city.​

Governments have fallen into disarray, Corporations and Private Military Contractors rule the streets.​

Take on a series of 'ASSIGNMENTS' and make them pay!​

The 'DEAD SECOND' is a bullet time reaction system. ​

Defeating an enemy activates a momentary bullet time slow motion giving you a chance to dodge incoming enemy fire. Chaining a quick succession of takedowns boosts your Score, Time & Accuracy points.

Progress through the Ranks and unlock additional Guns & Cosmetics on your way to the top of the Leaderboards.

name: Blaster Master: Pimp your Ride
description:
Blaster Master: Pimp your Ride, is an assembly hack for the NES platformer Blaster Master. Changes to most of the areas are minor save for areas 1 and 2 tank section, which are re-done. The changes are made to utilize the full effect of the ASM hack, and premise of this hack which is the 8 new additional upgrades the tank can get.

Yes, 8 new upgrades. That means the game has a total of 15 upgrades in all, and almost all of them are going to be needed to finish the game. Along with that are some other ASM changes, one that would need explaining is the gun powerup system. Instead of one gun unit equaling one level, you must collect many gun units to raise you gun power. The upside is that you do not lose your gun level if you get hit or die. This means that any powerup you find will not be wasteful.

name: Blue Sphere Plus
description:
Blue Sphere Plus is a Sonic & Knuckles hack. It is based on the Blue Sphere Standalone ROM, with new features, such as:

- Pressing B or C now cycles between Sonic + Tails (blue + orange bumpers), Sonic alone (both blue), Tails (both orange), Knuckles + Tails (red + orange bumpers), and Knuckles (both red).
- SRAM support to remember the character you last selected, and the last level completed.
- If holding A while pressing Start to start a stage, the player starts all stages from then on at top speed (not saved between sessions).
- You can now press Start at the first screen to reach the menu, instead of holding A + B + C.
- Select "SONIC 3K" on the first menu, and you will play through all 16 of Sonic 3 & Knuckles' Special Stages in order, including the 2 "secret" ones. Saving and code entry are disabled while this mode is active, and the game will reset upon completion of the last stage.
- Can Lock-On to other ROMs, including the Sonic games that would normally enable special modes when locked-on to Sonic & Knuckles.
- Users can lock-on a file containing custom levels to play.

name: Vegetable Valley Nightmare
description:
This hack only includes one level made up of all the Vegetable Valley levels with minor modifications and no collectable 1-Ups. (The 1-Ups are replaced with Tomatoes). The UFO secret was also removed.

You have no lives so when you die it’s game over and you have to start from the beginning.

name: Dragon Quest IV: Chapters of the Chosen
description: The English iOS/Android version of Dragon Quest IV brings back the Party Chat feature which was absent from the English DS version.

name: Sandman
description: Guide a group of sleepwalkers through the Land of Nod using sand.

name: Shada Kalo
description:
A game jam build for the Epic Mega Jam 2022.
The theme of the jam was: "As Above So Below"

Control the pair of characters in game to solve your way out of each level by solving puzzles.

WASD : Movement

Space : Jump

name: Don't Shit on My #!$@& Roof
description: Don't Shit On My Fucking Roof is a roguelite survival with an extremely simple gameplay. Move and aim, you don't even have to shoot! Choose a starting deity, gain experience and build your equipment. For you and your home. And yes, it looks like the game with vampires there... Or the one with lovecraftian monsters, or the one with living gun bullets, or the game with the crying baby... but well, here, we shoot pigeons.

name: Pretty Bird 2
description: Pretty Bird is a young bird learning to fly. Help Pretty Bird overcome various obstacles and most importantly get the highest possible score!

name: Super Spin
description: A cancelled top-down racing action game for the Sega Genesis.

name: Ebola 3
description: Ebola 3 is created in the spirit of the great classics of survival horrors. In this game, you will control the main character with a first-person camera which makes you feel like you’re in a real horror movie.

name: Second Stone: The Legend of the Hidden World
description: A retro-inspired adventure RPG with beautiful handcrafted visuals.

name: Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra
description:
This narrative-driven ensemble game stars Captain America Steve Rogers, Black Panther Azzuri (T'Challa's grandfather), U.S. soldier and member of the Howling Commandos Gabriel Jones, and leader of the fledgling Wakandan Spy Network, Nanali.

All four characters will be playable at different parts of the story. According to Skydance, players can look forward to "intuitive controls and exhilarating second-to-second gameplay that captures the action and excitement of Marvel, inspired by landmark comics, television, and films, as they navigate this all-new glob-trotting adventure."

name: Steamlands
description: Steamlands is an action puzzle game, featuring detailed diminutive pixel art graphics. The player is tasked to combat rogue steam tanks which roam the land of New Britannia after a devastating great war. To achieve this you are put in command of a modular steam tank you design yourself, from parts including an engine room (the heart of your contraption with engineer inside - vital for survival), tracks, pieces of armor, various guns and special compartments. You gain new pieces from defeated foes (repairs and construction are done during the battle), upgrades are also available (for a price).

name: Just Dance 2023 Edition
description: Welcome to a new era of dance with Just Dance 2023 edition! Now with online multiplayer, personalization, 3D immersive worlds and new songs and modes year-round, you can experience a never- ending dance party all year long!

name: Assassin's Creed Jade
description:
Explore the path of Xia in Assassin’s Creed Codename Jade. Set in the third century BC during the time of one of the first unified empires in China, an unprecedented era of trade and cultural exchange between East and West is just beginning, but with this comes new challenges and threats lurking in the shadows.

From the Great Wall outside the empire’s borders to the imperial capital of Xianyang, journey through a world filled with ancient history and hidden dangers. Defend against the Xiongnu and work to dismantle conspiracies, taking on greater responsibilities, and facing new challenges.

name: Assassin's Creed: Codename Hexe
description:
Official details are thin on Hexe, but it appears to have a horror slant, and Cote said it would provide “a different experience” in terms of game and game structure. It is heavily rumored to be set somewhere in the Holy Roman Empire during the infamous Witch Trials that were prominent in the 17th century. "Hexe" is German for "Witch" and in itself hints towards this setting.

Project Hexe is being led by Clint Hocking, who previously worked on Far Cry 2 and Watch Dogs: Legion. It will launch into the Assassin's Creed: Infinity Hub.

name: Star Trek Scene It?
description: A DVD game of Star Trek trivia!

name: The Impossible Bottle
description: Housework is only as dull as your imagination. Join Emma, six years old, on a playful adventure of peculiar proportions.

name: The Moonlit Tower
description:
No, not a prison, though stone stands around you, as expressionless as a mirror awaiting face and form; and in the silence you hear no plaint of flute or roar of gong, but instead the crash of porcelain shattering.

A work of interactive fiction by Yoon Ha Lee.

name: Music Catch 2
description: Catch all the new shapes, patterns, motions and songs! The task is simple…the more shapes you collect, the more points you get.

name: Tower of Greed
description: Your goal is to escape the infamous Tower of Greed, while collecting as many valuable gems as possible. There is an exit on every 5th floor, so you may choose when and where you wish to exit with your wealth. Be careful, though, not to let your greed overwhelm you. After all, money and death don’t mix.

name: Tapestry
description:
It is a symbol and a tool. It is your past and your future. It is all things, in time. You, Timothy Hunter, have lived, and like all things mortal you have died. But the aftermath of that lifetime is anything but simple...

Faced with creatures beyond your ken, the fruition of whose inscrutable motives hinge on your decisions, what will you do? Will you face who and what you once were? Or will you try to change things for the better? Or the worse?

name: Turandot
description: An operatic performance. A tale of atonement. A dating sim with a crocodile pit.

name: Heretic's Hope
description:
Eser is the only human left alive.

Gods and monsters, blessings and curses, an island ruled by giant insects — and in their midst: a reluctant human priest. Grief-stricken and bound by oath to obey the Queen’s newest divine decree, Eser will seek advice, encounter strange visitors, draw the attention of powers beyond comprehension, and surely make mistakes.

As a baby, they were brought to Achthoven to save their life.

As an adult, they must decide what kind of life is worth living.

name: Ryan Veeder's Authentic Fly Fishing
description: Relax at the Jewel Pond Recreation Area with Ryan Veeder as your guide.

name: Crocodracula: The Beginning
description: The first Taleframe game based on the 90s children's horror soap opera.

name: U.S.G. A New Beginning
description: STG/RPG hybrid developed in RPG Maker XP featuring a strength/weakness battle system and character levelling.

name: Water
description:
Water is a third person puzzle solving adventure type of game with an unique look and gameplay. It's a story about a mermaid, and fish men who aren't fish men. A story that brings you into tears and fears. It's about fish people, harp instruments, swimming, and crazy priests.

It is an artistic Half-Life 2 mod that fuses adventure, puzzle, and stealth game mechanics together in one. You take control of the goddess of the sea, one of the sister goddesses who founded the world.

name: Vain Empires
description: The memoir of a demonic spy in the Cold War between Heaven and Hell.

name: The Magpie Takes the Train
description: A millionaire guards a fabulous ruby in her private train car. Countless thieves have failed to steal it. But they weren't the Magpie!

name: Animalia
description:
This is the story of Charlie Stewart, nine-year-old Human child.

Inside this ordinary nine-year-old Human child are four animals from the Forest, working tirelessly to keep YOUR Taiga Federation safe from Human intervention.

name: Katana
description: Heavily influenced by popular Japanese Anime and recent movies such as Kill Bill; Katana combines Max Payne's stylish Bullet-Time with stunning, yet brutal, bladed-weapon combat. Developed by Maddieman and StratonAce, with help and support from Kenneth Yeung, Katana lifts the Max Payne engine to new heights and takes the player to new levels of pain.

name: Cannery Vale
description:
Hell, even a seagull would hit the spot right now, roasted crispy over a flame--

He immediately put all thoughts of food out of his head because at the moment it was just torture_

A work of interactive fiction by Hanon Ondricek.

name: When in Rome 1: Accounting for Taste
description:
Manhattan, May, 1954.

The last few years, you've settled into a routine. You work at the bank, you go home, you occasionally have dinner with your mother. It is all acceptably ordinary.

One day a strange creature crosses your path, and disrupts the schedule entirely.

A work of interactive fiction by Emily Short.

name: Polar Payne
description: Dinky is a polar bear whose family was murdered by Eskimos. He seeks revenge of the ones who murdered his family by attacking their camp and taking them out.

name: Polar Paradise
description:
It's Christmas Eve and Dinky is angry.

After returning home from his last adventure, Dinky discovers that his family have (once again) been kidnapped by the forces of evil. A mysterious trail of toys, tinsel, and wrapping paper leads into the night...

Enraged and with nothing to lose, Dinky heads out to save his family from a grizzly (yet seasonal) demise.

name: Santego Special Unit
description: Santego Special Unit is a mod for Max Payne 2: The Fall Of Max Payne based on Half-Life: Opposing Force.

name: Mission: Impossible - New Dawn
description:
When Major Sean Dickens’ F-15 crashes over Utah, everything looks like an accident. However, as the wreck is recovered, Dickens is gone, and with him the F-15’s deadly cargo: a new generation warhead.

Ethan Hunt’s mission is clear: the warhead has to be recovered before Dickens is able to sell it, and Dickens, along with the possible buyer, a former Russian general, with unknown intentions, have to be eliminated. However, all too soon Hunt realizes that things aren’t as they seem, and suddenly finds himself right in the line of fire. In his quest to gain answers, Hunt hits upon a conspiracy that puts doubts upon the trustworthiness of his own ranks, and change everything he believed in.

He has nothing to rely on.
And nobody left to trust.

But whoever is trying to deceive him – they have obviously forgotten with whom they have to deal…

name: Autumn Leaves
description: A Dlc-sized Quest Mod with more than 2000 pro-voiced lines. Delve into a centuries-old library inhabited by sentient machines, and solve Hypatia's mysteries. Five different endings, unique O.S.T.

name: When Day Breaks
description: "When Day Breaks" is a short SOMA mod that aims to turn S. D. Locke's Proposal from the SCP Foundation Wiki into a playable story, featuring the key events, and some additional ones, with my own interpretation on the environments.

name: Onirica
description: Onirica is a short, experimental and state of the art looking horror mod, which brings you to explore the darkest corners of hero’s mind.

name: Aida's Bizarre Halloween
description:
A stand-alone follow up to the adventure classic Aida's Strange Christmas!

Aida is trying to live a normal life after her past adventure in Santaland. But that grows harder as something new draws her away from her home, this time to a land of pumpkins and dark candy.

name: Resident Evil: During the Storm
description: A new Resident Evil 2 (1998) SourceNext mod that takes place during the first days of the Raccoon City outbreak. Playing as Kevin from the Outbreak series, you'll have to resist inside and outside the RPD, managing the few resources at your disposal and making sure that survivors don't die. For this, there will be new gameplay mechanics, and you'll have to choose carefully what you want to do, leaving room for dozens of outcomes. Not only your actions will affect the course of the story, but also the moment in which you do them, as there is an internal timer.

name: Shirogane x Spirits
description: Sin descripción

name: Atsumete! Banki-chan
description: A doujin game by Kyuushoku Touban based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Medieval Combat: Age of Glory
description: Fantasy-themed 2D fighting game fot mobile phones.

name: Beaver Fun
description: Beaver Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: The Football A
description: Throw the ball to become the best American football player in the world.

name: The Jumping Ice Cream
description: Join Big I on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Contra: The War of the Worlds
description: Contra: the War of the Worlds was released by Konami Shanghai in 2009 exclusively in China. It is official Contra game for J2ME. It has gameplay features from Contra III: the Alien Wars and its own gimmics, such as healthbar, low gravity zone, autoscrolling level and completely new plot and setting.

name: XenoMoon
description: Four astronauts are on a mission to the moon, it's a simple soil collection mission. But things start to get weird when Steffen discovers they're not alone...

name: Card Cowboy
description: On a quest for revenge in the wild west, how you play the cards you're dealt determines your fate.

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Premium Edition
description: Test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck! Your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve to as many customers as possible.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Mansion of Tricks
description: Investigate various areas and solve riddles in the Mansion of Tricks. Can you escape from the Mansion?

name: Arise + What Lies in the Multiverse Bundle
description: Some games just tug on those heart strings. We’ve packaged two stories that touch on what lies in the past and what lies ahead. Join these characters as one tries to fix a world he's broken, while the other relives a past world to remember what once was.

name: My Little Booth Bundle
description: All three Little Booth games in one bundle!

name: Turn-Based Strategy Bundle
description: Including four turn-based strategy games published by Goblinz!

name: Microgue
description:
Climb a dark tower in this Micro sized Rogue-like that focuses more on
character movement, than stats and gear.
Can you retrieve the treasure and escape the dragon’s wrath?

name: World of Trains
description: Discover the magic of the railway in the game World of Trains on the iPhone and iPad. Build your own railway and control the trains.

name: Stranded: Escape Skull Cove
description:
Join the young adventurers Tom & Jen in a brand new adventure out on the tropical islands off the coast of Ascencion Island.
They begin the adventure taking a private flight over the islands but things quickly descend out of control!
Can you help Tom & Jen unravel the puzzles of Skull Cove island they find themselves stranded on? Immerse yourself taking in the sights and sounds of Skull Cove. Collect tools and solve puzzles to find a way off the island.

name: Bruce Lee: Iron Fist 3D
description: 3D figting game for J2ME cellphones featuring Bruce Lee.

name: Shadowrun Returns: Deluxe Edition
description: It includes: Shadowrun Returns Game, The Shadowrun Returns Soundtrack, The Shadowrun Returns Anthology - Explore the world of Shadowrun Returns even more with an illustrated PDF of short stories written for the game.

name: Shadowrun: Hong Kong - Extended Edition Deluxe
description: It includes the full 22-track, 320kbps Shadowrun: Hong Kong Soundtrack from fan-favorite composer Jon Everist, and a 125-page Art of Shadowrun: Hong Kong PDF showcasing a wide variety of the concept and production art that went into the game.

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Ultimate Edition
description: In Ghost Recon Future Soldier join an elite team of highly trained, cut-throat special-ops soldiers. Armed to the teeth with unrivalled combat technology, Ghost Recon takes you to the globe’s most deadly warzones to hunt down the highest value targets.

name: Asterigos: Curse of the Stars - Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Asterigos: Curse of the Stars - Deluxe Edition
description: Asterigos Deluxe Edition includes the base game and Call of the Paragons DLC.

name: Aquarist Simulator VR
description: Get the best aquarium store in town! Create, renew, manage, observe. See if you can create an aquarium empire.

name: Dreamer's Road
description: Help make the world a better place while carrying the weight of your studies and 3 jobs on your shoulders! Experience the reality of thousands of young immigrants in the United States, seeking to improve themselves and help the growth of this great nation.

name: Quoin
description: Quoin is a top-down game where you shoot enemies collect coins and upgrade your stats. With a wide choice of weapons to use each serving a different role, Quoin will keep you captivated with different enemy types, weapons, and play styles.

name: Open Air
description: Summer! Sea! Festival! You've been waiting for this for so long, and here you are! But what is it, why are the stages empty, and everybody around you is sad? Explore the island, learn the stories of the islanders, unlock new strengths during meditations and arrange the loudest and coolest festival!

name: Pactus
description: A magician and a wendigo, wake up together inside a dark crypt. After centuries sleeping, you find yourself captive in the bowels of a massive cathedral. Only by working together will you find your way out...

name: Freestyle Mage
description: Freestyle Mage is a top-down action RPG game with lite rouge feature. The player will experience learning new magic during the battle, and build his own preferred battle style. Make the best use of synergy effect among spells to defeat different Crack Lords.

name: Mikiwam
description: A cozy queer tea-making game created by an all-Indigenous team. As the healer’s apprentice, serve magic elemental teas to influence a colourful cast of characters. Connect with your estranged home, discover your gifts, and find your place in this post-colonial world.

name: FootPool
description: FootPool is an original pool game that mixes with the rules of soccer

name: Boomshine Plus
description: A simple and easygoing, but addictive puzzle game

name: Roghill Incident
description: Roghill Incident is an Indie storytelling/exploration/kind-of-horror game that focuses on the story, while creating the uncomfortable feeling that something bad will happen soon.Find all the locations, notes and hints to get different endings.

name: EEvol
description: Simulate cellular life, create an aquarium, fill it with tens of thousands of cells, modify their DNA and watch them evolve! See how they fight for survival, give them food or put them in harm's way. Monitor the population of each species and their descendants.

name: Tapering Tower
description: Tapering Tower is a casual arcade game for accuracy. Build the tallest tapering tower.

name: Kvlt
description: Fight your way through armies of Nazi occultists, religious zealots, and unspeakable cosmic horrors to unveil the Eldritch secrets behind the war theatre in this 2000s-era-inspired grimdark singleplayer FPS where WW2 meets Cthulhu Mythos.

name: Lofi Checkers
description: Lofi Checkers is a cozy take on a classic game. Play with the AI or a friend for a light, refreshing game of checkers. Nothing beats the simplicity of a straightforward game when you have a few moments.

name: Gravity Box
description: Gravity Box is a retro-styled score attack game that requires the player to frantically swap gravity in order to avoid hazards. Grab the gems, unlock cool costumes, and see how long you can last!

name: Northmen: Wrath of Vikings
description: Northmen: Wrath of Vikings is an isometric city-builder in the Viking Age. Conquer the lands of the North! Set up your camp and make it prosper. Go back to the roots of city building games.

name: Investigation Stories: Windsound
description: As the investigation deepens, the secret of the town gradually emerges, the truth behind this is --?

name: Pipyakas
description: J2ME mobile game, similar to Bomberman. Supports Bluetooth multiplayer (up to 8 people).

name: Timewell: Trail of Celestes
description: Timewell: Trail of Celestes is an old-school story-driven 3D space shooter RPG. As A.I. SAT-V, explore exotic planets and fight with Constructs in an ever-deepening plot. Change her skills and adaptations on the fly. May you guide SAT-V to her destiny?

name: Exodus Checkmate
description:
You're trapped in school and monsters appeared... The only way out? Playing real-life and mortal chess! Explore complex Gameboards in this First Person Dungeon Crawler and raise the affection with your teammates to get closer to them!

You are the king. You are the school's only salvation!

name: Project Alex
description: The mysterious Project Alex is an unsolved mystery that could change the world if solved

name: CyberFuck 2069
description: CyberFuck 2069 is casual shooter game. You need to win the battle and pass levels to open unique and hot scenes with our girls. Cyberpunk atmosphere and locations will deep you to this very special vibe. So, girls are waiting for you, hurry up!

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage: Deluxe Edition
description:
In Assassin's Creed Mirage, you are Basim, a cunning street thief with nightmarish visions seeking answers and justice. Join an ancient organization and come to understand a new creed – one that will change Basim’s fate in ways he never could have imagined.

The Deluxe Edition includes a Prince of Persia–inspired outfit, eagle and mount skins, weapons, and more!

name: Dragon's Heaven
description: Dragon's Heaven is an incomplete and cancelled fighting game for the Neo-Geo. The game was being developed by Kengo Asai, who had previously worked on Voltage Fighter Gowcaizer and The Last Blade.

name: Epiphyllum in Love
description: Final chapter of the trilogy. In a world where memory can be controlled, everyone is selling their souls. "I" have left everything behind, except the girl named Yin who still remains in my mind. At the end of my life, should I die with a beautiful fantasy, or go in search of sad memories of her?

name: Microscopya
description: Microscopya is an adventure and puzzle game taking players on a journey through the inside of the cell, exploring its fantastical world and solving puzzles based on real molecular mechanisms.

name: NBA 2K23: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Rise to the occasion and realize your full potential in NBA 2K23. Prove yourself against the best players in the world and showcase your talent in MyCareer or The W. Pair today's All-Stars with timeless legends in MyTeam Build a dynasty of your own as a GM, or lead the league in a new direction as the Commissioner in MyNBA. Take on NBA or WNBA teams in Play Now and experience true-to-life gameplay. How will you Answer The Call?

name: Castle Walker
description: Castle Walker is a retro-style classical action platformer, where you play as a young mage who must fight with hordes of monsters and defeat the ancient evil. Fight bosses, gain new abilities and defeat ancient evil.

name: Dozie Penguins
description: Sin descripción

name: Maxoo 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Idle Startup Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Bermuda Adventures
description: Explore island, build a farm, harvest crops and craft new recipes in Bermuda Adventures!

name: The End is Nahual: If I May Say So
description: A surreal puzzle game, where everything that we put into the game is possible. Push yourself through puzzles, fights, dialogue boxes, and an inventory. Use your will, wits, and English reading ability, You can do it!

name: Fantasy Triple Mahjong
description: Sin descripción

name: Dream Square: Hinagata Akiko
description: Sin descripción

name: Kekkon Zenya
description: Kekkon "Zenya" is a multimedia disc for the Sega Saturn. It was followed by Kekkon: Marriage.

name: Galaxy Fräulein Yuna Remix
description: Galaxy Fräulein Yuna Remix is an updated re-release of the original 1992 Yuna game, enhanced by improving the graphics and adding new animation cutscenes.

name: Doukutsu Randamu
description: Experience art style and gameplay of classical indie game Cave Story in brand new procgen environment: each adventure is different and you only have one life for each!

name: Rockman 6: Unique Harassment
description: This is a complete hack of Rockman 6 (Megaman 6) that features new levels, music, weapons, and Robot Masters from across multiple Megaman games.

name: Generic Kart Racing
description: Generic Kart Racing is a celebration of the retro, 16-bit kart racers of old - a modern twist on the ol' tried and true kart racing formula!

name: Taimanin Gogo!
description: Sin descripción

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Season Ten: Price of Power
description: The target is General Peter Anderson, a power hungry True Sons leader looking to secure his position in the True Sons as Antwon Ridgeway's successor. This puts him in a position to build an alliance strong enough to take down The Division. General Anderson is looking to mend the relationship between the Black Tusk and the True Sons by brokering a peace in order to martial their combined forces against The Division. Well, we can't have that, now, can we? It is up to us to locate and eliminate the threat that Anderson poses. As you and your fellow Agents take out targets on the trail of General Anderson, you'll earn rewards through the new Season Pass and get the chance to score new cosmetic items during apparel events.

name: Mr Jump
description:
Are you ready to jump?

Meet Mr Jump, your new hero! Help him jump his way through the ingenious and tricky levels we have created for you!

Mr Jump will seriously challenge your skills and reflexes!

name: Gyeourui Tap
description: A text Roguelike RPG set in the dark fantasy world. Start an adventure to save mankind against the endless winter.

name: Erstwhile
description:
The neighborhood Thanksgiving party was going pretty well until you keeled over and died.

Now you're a ghost, and you're going to figure out who killed you. But you can't exactly interview people or search for clues when you're dead, can you? All you can do is piece together memories about what happened.

No one said the memories had to be yours.

name: I.A.G. Alpha
description:
You may think this game is about a post-Soviet Research Institute. About an experiment that went out of control. You may think that the initials "I.A.G." are somehow related to the Institute. You may think this game is unfinished. You may even think that the game ends exactly as the author tells you.

But then you will figure it out—these statements are not entirely true.

name: 1958: Dancing with Fear
description: "Dancing with Fear" (1958, directed by Víctor Ojuel). In this forgotten classic of Golden Age Hollywood, a vedette fallen on hard times (Salomé Vélez) finds herself enmeshed in a tangle of political intrigue, romance and betrayal in a Caribbean republic. Torn between her love for a smuggler, the lust of a corrupt policeman and the machinations of a Soviet intelligence operative, the protagonist navigates the dangers of a high-society party on the eve of revolution. As she tries to survive through that fateful night, the memories of her past will come to haunt her. Controversial at the time for its depiction of Cold War politics and morally ambiguous protagonist. (120 minutes, Technicolor, in-game hint system).

name: Witch fly
description: Try to see how many seconds you can survive!

name: The Great Forever Tomorrow
description: The Great Forever Tomorrow is a surrealist adventure through an AI's mind.

name: PocketShooting
description: A simple omni-directional shooting game.

name: Captain Verdeterre's Plunder
description:
You should carry the bag. I'm more of a delegator.

A work of interactive fiction by Ryan Veeder.

name: Mr Jump S
description:
He is back!

Mr Jump is coming back in a new adventure! Help him jump his way through dozens of ingenious and tricky levels!

Mr Jump S is a one-button platform game: jump to avoid the traps and reach the end of the level.

name: Muggle Studies
description:
You play as Alice Armstrong, the new Professor of Muggle Studies at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry in Scotland, even though you've never heard of "muggles" before and never knew magic was real until the headmaster proved it to you. But when you arrive at the school, you discover that a botched spell has made everyone disappear and you're now trapped within the castle. Is this something you can fix without magic?

A work of interactive fan fiction by Flourish Klink.

name: Living Legends: The Blue Chamber - Collector's Edition
description: When Alex visits his sister at Bird’s Nest Castle, he quickly discovers its curse – all the artwork has come to life!

name: Holiday Jigsaw Christmas 3
description: 500 high-quality photos! 500 ideas for a happy family holiday in Holiday Jigsaw Christmas 3!

name: Thelos
description: Your main ability is to place two crystals on a viable surface and pull towards them. You can use dashing, jumping, running, and perform a special jump which is available after collecting rewards. Your opposition will be two types of sentries, dragons, mines, and traps who all want to keep you down.

name: Tower Survivors
description: Fight an endless horde of evil minions and survive as long as you can. Collect loot and purchase new upgrades and magic abilities. Summon allies to stand along side you and survive the horde!

name: 2MD: VR Football Unleashed All Star
description: 2MD: VR Football Unleashed All Star is the massive sequel to the groundbreaking motion-controlled VR football game, 2MD: VR Football. Draw the plays and throw, hand-off, catch, and run the ball before the clock runs out!

name: The Lonely People
description: The game is a third-person open-world shooter in which you can hack, shoot, steal, and complete missions. We took making this game very seriously and we hope you will enjoy it, have a good day.PS: there is a control manual in the pause menu if you click on the "Controls" button.

name: Flower Cells
description: Flower Cells is a highly enjoyable game. Once you start, you won’t want to stop. Try it, and see how high you can score. The goal is to group five or more flowers of the same color together. Once the flowers are grouped, your score increases, and the grouped flowers disappear to make room for more maneuvers. After each turn, more flowers appear on the board and your task becomes more difficult. The game is over when the board completely fills up. Enjoy the game!

name: Mail Run Endless Delivery Rush
description:
Dedicated to celebrating (2016) 500 Glorious years of Royal Mail - The Official Mail of the UK.
Come help the amazing postal staff of Royal Mail deliver Mail all over London, while avoiding lovely London traffic of Double Decker Buses, Cars, police cars. Ride Loco, the Pink Elephant, collect money spread all over the streets and have the view of London like never before.
Your job for the day is to deliver mail by approaching the closest Red Mail Box, the mail is automatically delivered to the closest mail box, Yesss !! They have such magical technology !! Maybe you can find some wizards secretly hiding in plain sight as postal workers, you never know who will show up next !!

name: Tchow Rainbow
description:
In Rainbow, you direct light from the villainous D.D.'s Rainbow Ray through tricky levels in an effort to bring unwanted happiness and excitement to the inhabitants of a gray and mundane island.
While Rainbow's control mechanics are simple, crafty levels and puzzling hazards will test your reflexes and reasoning; and badges reward you for perfecting each level.

name: Nik and Kit's Math Quiz: Breakthrough Gaming Activity Center
description: Play all 30 levels answering simple math questions. Each level gives you three chances to get correct answer. If you mess up, you must start over.

name: Amity Park
description: Amity Park is a Dating Sim/Visual Novel game based on the notable Nickelodeon television show, Danny Phantom. The game is a bit of a retelling of the show, most notably with the introduction of explicit adult themes and suggestive content. You play as Danny Fenton, a boy who has accidentally been gifted amazing ghost powers due to his father's incredible ghost dimensional gateway. He must now use his powers to defend his town from other rampant ghosts, save the girl next door, and still turn in his homework on time. With plenty of ghosts to meet, with just as many cute girls to explore, Amity Park invites you to Go Ghost. Amity Park is made in Ren'Py, and uses 2D character portraits and 3D background models, all made by hand.​

name: Bibi & Tina: Das große Unwetter
description: After a devastating storm on the Martin's Farm, Bibi and Tina have to get the badly damaged farm back in shape and prepare everything for the return of the runaway horse Finja. The storm has messed things up and so the player helps the friends Bibi and Tina to collect objects lying around, repair them and bring them back to their destination.

name: Completion LawnCare
description: A short game where you take strange lawn-mowing requests and eventually get yourself into some big trouble.

name: Bikini Balls 2: Christmas Edition
description: Erotic-themed Breakout clone for J2ME cellphones.

name: The Joy of Creation: Ignited Collection
description: The Joy of Creation: Ignited Collection is an upcoming bundle developed by Nikson. The collection includes complete remakes of two "The Joy of Creation" games, including Reborn and Story Mode. both these games will be remade from the ground up, with new assets, new gameplay, etc.

name: Masha and Medved
description: Russian folk tales and Internet memes meet together in erotic platformer for J2ME phones.

name: Zutto Atai no Turn!
description:
This is a modified version of an English vocabulary memorization game that the author created in high school.
This game is a secondary production of Touhou Project.

name: Fright Cops
description: Fright Cops is an indie arcade game about cops and food, described by its author as "a portrayal of the police as what they are: a horde of murderous undead."

name: Nitori Dungeon
description:
How far can you conquer? This is a 2D action game.
This game is a derivative work of Touhou Project.

name: Furikake Spacey
description: Furikake Spicy is a Neo Showa Visual Novel!

name: Above Below
description: Above Below is a tree-growing simulator in which you can create your own unique tree. Manage resources to grow bigger and stronger. Strengthen yourself against the elements and threats that are determined to destroy you. Learn what makes a good tree great. From seed to tree the journey is up to you!

name: Aegis Kingdoms
description: Aegis Kingdoms is an online life-sim RPG. Seek daring adventures in the scenic Sky Island continent of Ophelia alongside companions. Fulfil commissions, grow crops, raise animals, join friends delving into dungeons or explore the open online world.

name: Alien Defense Unit
description: Alien Defense Unit is a VR Tower Defense game where the player with his abilities and his friends are all that protects their tower.

name: All Hands on Deck
description: All Hands on Deck is a local co-op game. Play as a pair, act like one! This adventure requires cooperation. Combine and use various items together in this playful puzzle platformer.

name: Ancient Cultures: Tikal's Realm
description: Ancient Cultures: Tikal's Realm, is an action-adventure game that takes you to the height of one of the greatest Mayan civilizations. Become a legendary warrior of Tikal, train with the army of the time, explore mystical places of this mythology and finally, acquire the powers of the ancient gods.

name: Ancient Rituals: Stonehenge
description: Ancient Rituals: Stonehenge is a ludic VR experience, where you will experience our interpretation of an ancient pagan ritual. A ritual that is beyond linear time and three dimensional space.You are in an exploration to find yourself

name: Anesthesia
description: When tragedy strikes, a young child has to go under anesthesia in order to save his life. When this happens, he imagines a fantasy island full of mystical wonder and creatures. After his procedure, he longs to go back to this world eventually killing himself.

name: Another Space Opera: Episode 1 - The Wake of The Giant
description: In 2297, Earth is united under a gestalt technocratic order - reborn from the ashes of nuclear fire. Now, humanity finds itself caught in the crossfire of a bloody, supernatural conflict for the fate of the galaxy. Hack and blast your way through this explosive, cinematic action platformer.

name: Artificial Extinction 2
description: Defend your base by strategically placing autonomous weaponry. Upgrade your defenses by mining resources. Unlock new tech to build more powerful weapons. Expand your territory to strengthen your defenses. When under attack from enemy Mechs, pick up your rifle and get in the fight!

name: Last Sapiens
description: Doomsday survival games. You can fight zombies, steal zombie supplies, the zombies will fight each other, and you can take advantage of them... The game takes place shortly after the human Dark Forest Strike

name: Archenemy: Lunafall
description: An era of "peace" just liberated from the powerful ruling of The Church, A doomsday prophecy of "the fall of the moon", A struggle and intrigue around the "last Saint". "Archenemy: Lunafall" is a romantic and suspenseful visual novel, which will tell a story about "self" and...

name: Find the light
description: is a 1st person adventure game. In the game, you played as a claustrophobic patient. The dark and narrow places is your biggest enemy. You must help avoid the darkness, find the light source, solve layers of mysteries, and finally escape from the danger.

name: Frozen Sword: Countermark RE
description: Engraved War: Frozen Sword is a strategic battle flag game set in a sword and sorcery crossover story. The player takes on the role of a gamer who, by chance, travels to the world of his own story, where the world is slowly changing and he meets Princess Elisa, whose kingdom has been destroyed.

name: ZombieSquad
description: Fight The Voxelized Zombie Hoards in this FPS online Co-op Survival shooter. Survive, unlock more areas and powerups as you progress through a vast maze of post apocalyptic ruin. Purchase a gun from the wall or the "random mystery gun chest". Online Co-op 1-4 Players.

name: Zim's Word Game
description: In this fast-paced word game, you build words from falling tiles before your game board fills up. Compete with your friends on the global leaderboards for high scores and longest time played. Always keep an eye out for the Word Of The Day.

name: Zeltoid X1
description: Help Zeltoid to save his planet by exploring the galaxy in search of zitoride, essential energy for life, craft new abilities, solve strange puzzles and find the reason for the mysterious disappearance of zitoride in the galaxy.

name: Your Waifu Juice
description: Fight with the dungeon dwellers and enjoy sex scenes with lovely girls! You have to consistently conquer 5 dungeons of varying difficulty. Defeat opponents, fight terrible bosses, get more and more sophisticated weapons.

name: Xuhivan's Autonomous Cube
description: Xuhivan's Autonomous Cube is a Roguelike Auto Battler, played on a twistable magic cube. Use the strengths and weaknesses of your units wisely to fight through a series of cubes, and reach the final boss before you exceed the number of allowed rotations.

name: World War 3: Card Battler
description: Play as your favorite country, in a card battle for world domination.

name: World At War 85 Digital
description: World At War 85 Digital is a dynamic platoon-level combat computer game based on the award-winning board games of the same series name. World At War 85 Digital series centered on armor, artillery, and infantry combat during 1985 World War 3.

name: Wonderland Quest
description: Wonderland Quest is a casual point & click adventure game. Travel across Wonderland teeming with colorful challenges, surprises and creatures, brought to life with beautiful artwork.

name: Wonder Land
description: An crazy platformer where every thing you collect can have a an impact on the game.

name: WingMan
description: WingMan is a point & click adventure game, where you will embark on a whirlwind adventure with Tbone as his wingman. As we all know, It’s about taking one for the team, regardless of the circumstances. You and Tbone will go to different nightclubs to dance and flirt with ladies all around the world.

name: We Can Make It
description: You and your friends will team up to face the world in this third person challenge. Do your best to stay alive and try to be stealthy. This game has permadeath and relies on planning ahead so you can stay alive. Whether it be zombies, players, or AI, they are all out to get your blood.

name: Warp Soldier
description: A 2D retro monochrome Metroidvania adorned with a vast array of melee combos, movement options, and most importantly, monsters!

name: War In Heaven
description: Chaotic boss-rush, bullet-hell-y, twin-stick arena shooter mayhem! Dynamically changing arena forces you to be vigilant: Watch the bullets, watch the walls!

name: VR War Lab
description: Be yourself without restrictions in this physics-based VR sandbox shooter. Fight for the future of humankind, rise an empire, defeat the mightiest tyrants, explore new horizons, enjoy unmatched experiences with friends, and build your weapons, vehicles, and bases with your own hands.

name: VR Tribes
description: VR Tribes is an action-packed and strategic online multiplayer battle. One in VR and up to three as PC players. As VR player you have to conquer the island and protect your magical crystals. The PC players have to join together to attack and defeat the VR player.

name: Ultimate Panzer
description: Drive your tank through abandoned and decrepit cities and battle the evil alien machines in this fast-paced and explosive action rogue-like

name: Unsolved Case
description:
Unsolved Case is the free prequel to the popular cooperative point-and-click puzzle game 'Cryptic Killer' series.
Dip your toes in and go back to where it all began as you team up in two as detective duo Old Dog and Ally, up against the Cryptic Killer. For the first time in the series, you'll encounter a labyrinth of puzzles and challenges laid by one of the most devious minds in the world. Solve puzzles, crack codes, and find a way out.
Have you got what it takes to crack the Unsolved Case of the Cryptic Killer?
Unsolved Case is a free game for two players to complete in 30-60 minutes. In this puzzle game, you'll get a taste of the mystery to come over the 5-part Cryptic Killer series.

name: Vade Retro: Exorcist
description: Vade Retro is a 4 player PvP exorcism game. Play as Demon and make your opponents go through hell, or join the exorcist team by choosing a specialty to save victims from the devil's grip in this action-packed experience.

name: Vampire Clans
description: Create the most powerful Vampire Clan, to take over Paris streets and underground. Challenge other clans, beat them and enslave. Use spells, alchemy and human blood to grow up your power. Become the terror of all inhabitants or use quiet politics to achieve your goals.

name: Vayan
description: Arena combat alone or with others (1 to 4 players). Proudly defeat hordes of monsters and survive ever more diabolical chains of traps. Are you a Streamer? Take care! Your cat also participates in the competition!

name: Ven Adventure
description: Ven Adventure is a single-player 3D platform game. You happen to meet Ven on his unknown planet, invaded by Bruce Nelson, who wants to destroy the magical world.

name: Vivat Slovakia
description: Vivat Slovakia is a third-person shooter set in the 90s´ Bratislava, the capital of Slovakia, where the streets are full of thugs and local mafia supported by the corrupted government. The game contains five weapons to use, 30 classic cars of that time to drive and one open city to explore.

name: Vladimere's Lhore
description: A collection of games by Vladimere Lhore.

name: V Lights
description: V Lights is a 2D multiplayer horror game with eye-catching graphics. Set strategic traps on your opponent with items, light controls, and dash time.

name: Titan Shell
description: Titan Shell is a roguelike twin-stick platformer set in a dystopian world. Travel by shell, or by foot, across a massive mountain full of hazardous terrain, bloodthirsty mercenaries, and a ridiculously well-funded police force.

name: Tinting Time
description: Tinting Time is a Japanese-style crafting game. Play as a creator who can create all kinds of solutions, and spend some leisure time in the city of Folest. The game's creation system that combines crafting and complex resource management gameplay is eye-catching.

name: Tide of Thieves
description: Tide of Thieves is a colorful light-hearted top-down action adventure. You take the helm of a pirate ship crewed by a salty old sea captain, a cannoneer who always expect the worse and a witty cartographer, all trying to claim back their treasure.

name: Thistledown: Marrowroot
description: In a world riddled with dangerous magic, a half-dead opossum has to find the source of a toxic fungus that is threatening his family. Digging into dark, forbidden houses and dodging a murderous fairy named Barker, he discovers the problem is deeper than he ever would have dreamed.

name: Tiles and Towers TD
description: A 3D tower defense where not only the towers matters but also the ground that alters the towers. Spiced up with randomized wave modifications, skilltree, unique towers and spells. Voila! You get Tiles and Towers TD!

name: The Unluckiest Man
description: After his wife draws her last breath, Dragomir is devastated. As a poor man with a drinking habit, he must not only manage to hold a decent funeral, but also stand for himself in a small town that doesn't see him with good eyes.

name: The Pepper Prince: Episode 5 - A Royal Descent
description:
He's found. But his heart is broken into a thousand pieces. It is up to you to bring him back from the brink and return together to restore the kingdom!

This DLC unlocks Episode 5 of The Pepper Prince: Seasoning 1, a quirky point-and-click adventure about love, grief, and the power of friendship. Solve puzzles, meet quirky fairy-tale-inspired characters, and help your friend regain confidence and self-love after heartbreak!

name: The Overthrow
description: The Overthrow is an RPG slasher game with one life, with hardcore arena battles, a special leveling tree and a system of procedurally generated enemies. In the game you have to be one of the recruits of the squad to overthrow the government. The world is inhabited by robots with humanoid AI.

name: Suspicious
description: An online party game of teamwork and deception for up to 8 players, with full VR support for increased immersion. Experience incredible stories unfold as you and your friends discover who is the killer!

name: Sword Islands
description: Get reborn as an adventurer and master your blade in a VR experience designed with action and exploration in mind. Go solo or join your party, with up to 4 players co-op campaign.

name: The Dancer: Definitive Edition - Revolution
description: Take back Brazil(?) As the elusive Bronze mothership threatens to destroy the country in this brand new Dancer adventure!

name: The brave loves the body of the devil
description: Tucker's goal is to become a heroic brave, and for this he embarked on a journey to defeat the devil, but after seeing the devil, he has a brand new goal-to make the devil his own woman!

name: Tales of Elendar
description: Tales of Elendar is a 3rd person and top-down RPG focusing on gameplay, especially on combat mechanics, allowing wide control of special abilities usage, while offering a well prepared lore and story with few dialog reading and noticeable philosophical content.

name: The Blue Cat
description: The Blue Cate is a game about a little girl who finds a cat and learns about love and compassion.

name: The Excrawlers
description: Action-RPG roguelike game in which you and others hero will have to plunge into the dark atmosphere of dungeons full of monsters and madness.

name: The Hunt of the Blood Moon
description: The Hunt of the Blood Moon offers a first person murder mystery experience. Interacting with friends and other people from all over the world to find out who is the mythological creature that’s trying to kill everyone else. Win by killing the creature, before it kills you.

name: The Hustle
description: The Hustle is an open-world board game about GETTING RICH: avoid government overreach, ruin real-world friendships, and go anywhere - anywhere - to build your empire from the bottom up.

name: The King's Tournament
description: The King's Tournament is a party game playable with up to 4 players in Online and Local Multiplayer. TKT is a fun party game, with a replacement of the board game phase by transforming it into an intense combat phase with various items and endless customization.

name: The Lightnwatchers
description: The Lightnwatchers is a 2.5D shooter and fighting game. In the future, humans open the portal connecting the other world. The Lightn, an organization that guards human cities, welcomes a new agent "J". He will guard the city while facing the threat from the other world with his friends.

name: Summoner's Tale
description: Summoner’s Tale is an Action-Platformer monster collecting game in a new way! Collect Monsters, discover their unique abilities, build your dream squad and fight your way to save the world!

name: Super Adventure Hand
description: It’s the world’s most adventurous hand! You play as a hand on a gripping handventure, a quest, a calling, through a strange and dangerous world. And in the end figure out why your beloved arm has left you.

name: Strange Dungeon
description: Find allies, friends, or lovers as your crew explores, researches, and negotiates their way through this turn-based tactical roguelike about convincing cave monsters not to kill you. Make smart decisions to avoid vicious perils like nuclear meltdowns, panic attacks, and badly seasoned fish.

name: Stories from the Outbreak
description: Stories from the Outbreak is a turn-based zombie RPG. Lead a group of survivors from the doomed city of Riga towards the ferry sailing across the North Sea. Scavenge for supplies, fight the zombies, decide the fate of your crew. What are you willing to sacrifice to survive the zombie plague?

name: Steampunk Gravity
description: Steampunk Gravity is an action-simulation game where you pilot a ship, in the air and in the sea, with the objective of recovering very heavy explosive charges through confined spaces underground.

name: SPQR: Crime Stories in Ancient Rome
description: SPQR is a mystery thriller drama about a PTSD ridden legionary turned detective, whose cases lead him spiraling deeper into a web of deceit, corruption, and murder when he unmasks a powerful cult with a plan to destroy the republic.

name: Shattered Star
description: Shattered Star is a small indie game made by 3 action game enthusiasts that tends to combine hack&slash and roguelike gameplay together to let you have the most fun out of it. There is no storyline due to the limit of 3 part-time developers. Just drop, kill, and have fun.

name: SIC-1
description: SIC-1 is a single-instruction programming game. Neglect your personal life in pursuit of promotions and vague assurances of job security! Optimize your programs to rise to the top of the leaderboards! SIC Systems thanks you for your hard work! Now please return to your desk.

name: Silent Bloom
description: Explore Between Two Worlds, Mortal And Spiritual As You Solve The Mystery Behind A New Devastating Supernatural Phenomenon.

name: Slurpies Free
description: Snake, slither, SLURRPP! In this free multiplayer arcade game, control luminescent snakes that grow in length and size. Collect as much food as possible and survive each round without colliding with yourself and other players in fast-pacing battles.

name: SobokoSnake
description: Combining the powers of two classics, Sokoban and Snake, this game presents you with a series of increasingly difficult puzzles. Push boxes, fill pits and open doors to clear the levels by eating all the food while trying not to get yourself stuck.

name: Solanaceae: After All
description: Join Battam, a witch exiled by all conventional covens, on his quest to make a brand new type of coven! Explore a colorful world, gather ingredients for potion brewing and cooking, immerse yourself in a long and detailed story, and view sexy scenes!

name: Somewhen
description: Fight, fish, build, cook, and invent your way through 8 chapters guaranteed with hours of play through a unique dungeon stage system, turn-based combat, and challenges. Collect hundreds of items. Built a town? Migrate special NPCs to them! Invent new weapons and trinkets! Restore the world!

name: Sakura Alien 2
description: Haru’s life was turned upside-down when the alien princess, Ena, declared herself his future wife – but now things are getting really crazy, with the appearance of a beautiful new professor at Haru’s university, who seems a little too interested in Ena. What will happen next?

name: Scrap Seas
description: Scrap Seas is a Vehicle 3rd-Person Shooter Action Rogue-Like. Build your ship and fill it to the brim with every kind of weaponry you can find. Then take it out into the ocean to take part in fast-paced generated sea battles against your Robot Overlords.

name: Seranu
description: Find lost treasure, fame and fortune in the ruins of the Lost City! SERANU brings spelunking to the PC in a single-player adventure full of puzzles and mysteries.

name: Serious Sally
description: Serious Sally is the daughter of a very serious man. She wants to be just like her father. Her adventure is for you to follow in this old-school first-person shooter created with respect for the good old classic games of the genre. Just pure fun and violence for those who love it.

name: Seven Wonders
description: Seven Wonders is an ancient city-building game. It brings you back to ancient times, where you have to build the seven wonders of the ancient world. You have to manage resources and labor to build the wonders.

name: Rescue Operations Simulator
description: Rescue Operations Simulator is a game where you play the role of USAR (Urban Search and Rescue) member and a team leader. You will arrange and execute rescue operations from real life catastrophic events that shocked and changed the whole world.

name: Red Trigger 2
description: Red Trigger 2 is an FPS Puzzle Game inspired by Portal, Antichamber and more. Use a gun that can expand or retract red blocks, but you can only expand three at a time, so you'll need to manage your energy wisely. Those red blocks are used in many different and ingenious ways.

name: Raven Estate
description: Become the bullet-hell as you play a crow on a mission to expel the monsters from his newly acquired estate in this high-octane shoot-em-up!

name: Puppet Master
description: A chaotic ragdoll physics fighting game where you take on the puppet masters of this world. Yes, it's Controversial! Choose your country to fight in and climb the pyramid to the top, if you can make it there! Don't lose your limbs! Make all the money you can and become the master of this world.

name: Project Imperium
description: Project Imperium is an open-world medieval sandbox. As serf or liege, smith, trade, farm, build, or conquer your way to fortune, glory, and a thriving medieval kingdom. Use your skills in construction, warfare, and crafting to build great towns and castles, then defend them from your enemies.

name: Princess hunter
description: Lead a party of monstergirl princesses on an exciting journey across a variety of worlds. Explore hand-drawn locations, fight numerous enemies in turn-based card battles and find keys to the hearts of your companions!

name: Planet Rhythm
description: A mind-bending rhythm game with unique mechanics for every level, crisp inputs that leave your jaw hanging, and a really cool alien sidekick that helps you discover the secrets behind the worlds in this corner of the galaxy, each seemingly created around a music genre.

name: Lights Out: TPP Shooter
description: Planked! Survive & Thrive is a multiplayer adventure, crafting, and building game. Work together or alone to gather resources, craft items, and fight your way around the island, but beware, not all pirates are friends!

name: Please, Come Back Before Winter
description: Please, come back before winter is a poetic adventure game. Play as Naëlle the brave little mouse and find your lost siblings, grieving after the passing of your adoptive mother. Mark your way as you explore an inconstant world to get home as fast as possible before winter arrives!

name: Potion Pipeline
description: Build huge factories to harvest magical resources and produce potions. Design complex production lines from simple parts to transform ingredients using a deep alchemy system. Ramp up production to fulfill Guild orders, unlock new machines, and create more powerful potions!

name: Prepare Uranus: Exploring Black Holes for Adults
description: Prepare Uranus is NSFW Visual Novel, where you're taking control of a bar on the planet Uranus, in which beautiful girls work. You have to improve the economy of your bar, pay off debts to space pirates, unravel the mystery of Black Holes and make Uranus the most popular place in the galaxy!

name: Blue Print
description: play a sandbox with infinite possibilities.

name: CoComelon: Play with JJ
description: Come over for a playdate with JJ full of musical minigames, interactive objects, and favorite singalongs like Yes Yes Vegetables and Wheels on the Bus!

name: Miraculous: Rise of the Sphinx
description: Paris needs a hero! Once again, the city of lights is in trouble as it faces a new menace—the most threatening sentimonster ever created is about to take control! As you take on the personna’s of the globally renowned superheroez Ladybug and Cat Noir, you’ll need to unveil the diabolical plan hatched by archvillain Hawk Moth—and squash it! Immerse yourself into the magical world of Miraculous and level up your superpowers as you embark on your biggest journey yet!

name: GeneWars
description: This is the story of the birth of life. You will take on the role of the 23,008689th sperm cell to be born, fighting and advancing to fulfil your birthright, to create a great legend.

name: In Dreams of Addict Remastered
description: "In Dreams of Addict Remastered" - A re-release of the original 2018 game with a new story and improved graphics. You will play as a guy named Jora, who has fallen into a coma due to excessive alcohol consumption. You enter Jora's consciousness, consisting of his memories and deepest fears. Help Jora fight his nightmares, which are holding him back, and get out of his coma.

name: In Dreams of Addict 2
description: "In Dreams of Addict 2" is the sequel to the re-release of the original game. Now his girlfriend Lisa will fight for Jora, who out of despair has decided to experiment in order to get into jora's mind. Help the girl to cope with hostile subconscious creatures, find jora and leave his world.

name: Ookami-kun
description: Jump action game by Wanpaku Pixels.

name: Ookami-kun to Kabocha-kun
description: This is a game of Onigokko by Wanpaku Pixels.

name: Fall Guys: Season 2 - Satellite Scramble
description: Fall Guys is launching a brand new season... IN SPACE! Fall Guys: Season 2 - Satellite Scramble sees the residents of the Blunderdome leaving the relative safety of their planet for the first time. By heading to the stars, you’ll explore the wonders and challenges of the vacuum!

name: Ookami-kun 3
description: The wolf is the main character in this game by Wanpaku Pixels.

name: Ookami-kun 4
description: The wolf is the main character in this game by Wanpaku Pixels.

name: Ookami-kun 5
description: The wolf is the main character in this game by Wanpaku Pixels.

name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Slither Link
description:
Slitherlink (also known as Fences, Takegaki, Loop the Loop, Loopy, Ouroboros, Suriza and Dotty Dilemma) is a logic puzzle developed by publisher Nikoli.

Slitherlink is played on a rectangular lattice of dots. Some of the squares formed by the dots have numbers inside them. The objective is to connect horizontally and vertically adjacent dots so that the lines form a simple loop with no loose ends. In addition, the number inside a square represents how many of its four sides are segments in the loop.

Other types of planar graphs can be used in lieu of the standard grid, with varying numbers of edges per vertex or vertices per polygon. These patterns include snowflake, Penrose, Laves and Altair tilings. These add complexity by varying the number of possible paths from an intersection, and/or the number of sides to each polygon; but similar rules apply to their solution.

SuperLite 1500 Series - Slither Link is a puzzle game based on the Slitherlink logic puzzle featuring over 200 different stages.

name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Sudoku 4
description:
Sudoku is a logic-based, combinatorial number-placement puzzle. The objective is to fill a 9×9 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3×3 sub-grids that compose the grid (also called "boxes", "blocks", "regions", or "sub-squares") contains all of the digits from 1 to 9. The puzzle setter provides a partially completed grid, which typically has a unique solution.

Completed puzzles are always a type of Latin square with an additional constraint on the contents of individual regions. For example, the same single integer may not appear twice in the same 9x9 playing board row or column or in any of the nine 3x3 subregions of the 9x9 playing board.

The puzzle was popularized in 1986 by the Japanese puzzle company Nikoli, under the name Sudoku, meaning single number. It became an international hit in 2005.

SuperLite 1500 Series - Suudoku 4 is the fourth sudoku game in the series for the Playstation One console that features over 198 different sudoku challenges. The game features 3 different difficulty levels (easy, medium & hard) each of them with several sudoku puzzles..

name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Sudoku 5
description:
Sudoku is a logic-based, combinatorial number-placement puzzle. The objective is to fill a 9×9 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3×3 sub-grids that compose the grid (also called "boxes", "blocks", "regions", or "sub-squares") contains all of the digits from 1 to 9. The puzzle setter provides a partially completed grid, which typically has a unique solution.

Completed puzzles are always a type of Latin square with an additional constraint on the contents of individual regions. For example, the same single integer may not appear twice in the same 9x9 playing board row or column or in any of the nine 3x3 subregions of the 9x9 playing board.

The puzzle was popularized in 1986 by the Japanese puzzle company Nikoli, under the name Sudoku, meaning single number. It became an international hit in 2005.

SuperLite 1500 Series - Suudoku 5 is the fifth sudoku game in the series for the Playstation One console that features over 200 different sudoku challenges. The game features 3 different difficulty levels (easy, medium & hard) each of them with several sudoku puzzles..

name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Oekaki Puzzle 1

We offer a total of 500 questions and problems can enjoy hearty beginners to advanced.
